concept.definition: Stakeholder supports pursuit of the goal
Stakeholder is not in support of the pursuit of the goal
Stakeholder has not yet made a decision on whether they support the goal

description: Codes indicating whether the goal has been accepted by a stakeholder
name: GoalAcceptanceStatus

text.div:
GoalAcceptanceStatus

Codes indicating whether the goal has been accepted by a stakeholder

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/goal-acceptance-status defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
agree AgreeStakeholder supports pursuit of the goal
disagree DisagreeStakeholder is not in support of the pursuit of the goal
pending PendingStakeholder has not yet made a decision on whether they support the goal
